name: Barnstable
description: Barnstable is the largest community on Cape Cod, comprising seven villages each with its own unique character. Known for its beautiful beaches, historic sites, and outdoor activities.

airports.name: Barnstable Municipal Airport
airports.description: Serves Cape Cod with commercial and private flights

bus_services.name: Cape Cod Regional Transit Authority (CCRTA)
bus_services.description: Provides public bus service throughout Barnstable and Cape Cod

train.name: CapeFLYER
train.description: Seasonal train service from Boston to Hyannis (Memorial Day to Labor Day)

ferry_services.name: Hy-Line Cruises
ferry_services.description: Offers ferry services to Nantucket and Martha's Vineyard from Hyannis Harbor

ferry_services.name: Steamship Authority
ferry_services.description: Provides year-round ferry service to Martha's Vineyard and Nantucket

tourist_information.best_time_to_visit: Late spring to early fall (May to September)

popular_events.name: Barnstable County Fair
popular_events.description: Annual agricultural fair with rides, food, and entertainment

popular_events.name: Hyannis Summer Arts and Craft Festival
popular_events.description: Outdoor festival showcasing local artisans and craftspeople
